# Orion Software Solutions
> Enterprise software and AI development in South Africa

## About
Founded in 2025, Orion Software Solutions delivers world-class custom software, AI solutions, and digital transformation services from Volksrust, South Africa. 50+ successful projects delivered.

## Services
- Custom Software Development: React, TypeScript, Spring Boot, microservices
- AI & Machine Learning: Chatbots, predictive analytics, computer vision
- Mobile App Development: React Native, Expo, iOS/Android
- Backend & API Services: Spring Boot, JWT, PayFast integration
- Cloud Deployment: AWS, Netlify, CI/CD
- UI/UX & Optimization: Responsive design, 3D galleries

## Key Case Studies
- BoozeInDoors: On-demand delivery platform (40% revenue increase)
- AI Customer Support Chatbot: 40% reduction in support tickets
- SecurePay API: R5M+ processed with 99.99% uptime
- 3D Artist Gallery: Featured on Awwwards

## Contact
- Email: info@orionsoftware.co.za
- Location: Volksrust, Mpumalanga, South Africa
- Response time: 24 hours
